title: AD Fizz
body: Been seeing heaps of AD Fizz lately, since he was nerfed. I don't actually think I've seen a single AP Fizz. Keyori even did AD Fizz I think. Thoughts?

replies.body: I have stomped lane every time I take him top last game I was worried cuz I was versing Jax but still stomped him, yeah he is pretty good but I think part of that is people underestimating how good it can be.

Bruiser cooldown Fizz top is pretty damn strong, especially since the ult increases damage full stop and not just magic damage. Friend doubted it when I tried it first time and it turned out great :D Even I underestimate his damage when playing him.
